description: This file defines a UI component for displaying and managing a list of notes in a frontend application, utilizing LightningJS's Blits framework. It includes rendering logic, state management, and interaction handlers for selecting and deleting notes.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of a note by emitting the selected note's ID and updating internal state.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Wrapper around $emitSelect to trigger selection of a note by ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note with a default title and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Deletes a note after confirmation, updates the list of notes, and adjusts selection accordingly.
